content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #88696 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
P-medium perhaps? It's possible this is a never_type-specific bug, though I'm not sure.

never_type is still unstable and hasn't seen a lot of activity, I think.

Would then lower the priority to P-low? (unless that error suggests something beyond the never_type thing)

Would then lower the priority to P-low? (unless that error suggests something beyond the never_type thing)

The issue is it's AFAICT not known whether this can only be triggered using never_type. However, it seems likely to me that this is an underlying bug in e.g. rustc_trait_selection that is being triggered by never_type. That's why I suggested P-medium.
